Original: Get a load of what happened when I
was fishin' at a [Color:5]hidden lake to the
southwest of the Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0]!
[Page]
Suddenly, this whopper of a turtle
I ain't never seen before attacked!
It was like to eat me!
[Page]
I barely got out with my life, but no
one believes my story! They all want
some dadblamed proof!
[Page]
So I want you fellers to whomp that
giant turtle and bring back its
[Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0] as proof.
[Page]
It's nocturnal, so you'd best [Color:5]splash
some food around[Color:0] that hidden lake
round about [Color:5]midnight[Color:0].
[Page]
I'm counting on you to make it happen!
Good luck to you.
Translation: Get a load of what happened when I
was fishin' at a [Color:5]hidden lake to the
southwest of the Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0]!
[Page]
Suddenly, this whopper of a turtle
I ain't never seen before attacked!
It was like to eat me!
[Page]
I barely got out with my life, but no
one believes my story! They all want
some dadblamed proof!
[Page]
So I want you fellers to whomp that
giant turtle and bring back its
[Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0] as proof.
[Page]
It's nocturnal, so you'd best [Color:5]splash
some food around[Color:0] that hidden lake
round about [Color:5]midnight[Color:0].
[Page]
I'm counting on you to make it happen!
Good luck to you.

Original: You already have the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0].
You need only report back to the
client and the request is complete!
Translation: You already have the [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0].
You need only report back to the
client and the request is complete!

Original: Round [Color:5]midnight[Color:0], splash some food
around that [Color:5]hidden lake to the
southwest of the Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0].
[Page]
Though it's still up to chance whether
it shows. You'll just have to keep
the food coming 'til it does.
[Page]
And if it does come around and you
manage to defeat it, but it doesn't
drop the [Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0]... Good luck!
Translation: Round [Color:5]midnight[Color:0], splash some food
around that [Color:5]hidden lake to the
southwest of the Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0].
[Page]
Though it's still up to chance whether
it shows. You'll just have to keep
the food coming 'til it does.
[Page]
And if it does come around and you
manage to defeat it, but it doesn't
drop the [Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0]... Good luck!

Original: Hey, how'd it go? You get yourselves
a [Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0]?
Translation: Hey, how'd it go? You get yourselves
a [Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0]?

Original: [Color:5]Do you have it?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Do you have it?[Color:0]

Original: Yep... that's a [Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0], sure as
shooting. I knew you fellers could
pull it off! Nice work!
[Page]
I can't wait to take this and shove
it in the face of every so-and-so
who called me a liar!
[Page]
I can't thank you enough for this.
That's all for my request! Be sure
to tell the little lady you're done!
Translation: Yep... that's a [Color:5][Item:1051][Color:0], sure as
shooting. I knew you fellers could
pull it off! Nice work!
[Page]
I can't wait to take this and shove
it in the face of every so-and-so
who called me a liar!
[Page]
I can't thank you enough for this.
That's all for my request! Be sure
to tell the little lady you're done!

Original: If you could keep my request to you
under the hat, I'd mighty appreciate
it. I'll tell people I caught it! Ha!
Translation: If you could keep my request to you
under the hat, I'd mighty appreciate
it. I'll tell people I caught it! Ha!

Original: Ah, that's fine. I'll be waiting here
as long as it takes.
Translation: Ah, that's fine. I'll be waiting here
as long as it takes.
